short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize your emails and turn them into tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool that summarizes emails and turns them into tasks. 

Swiftly: Email Summarizer & Task Creator – Your Productivity Companion!

Tired of sifting through lengthy emails to extract action items? Our Chrome extension simplifies your email workflow. With a simple highlight, it automatically summarizes important text and converts it into a to-do task, saving you time and effort.

Key Features:

➣ Effortless Summarization: Just highlight the relevant part of the email, and our extension intelligently condenses it into a concise summary.
➣ Seamless Task Creation: In a single click, the summarized content is transformed into a to-do task.
➣ Customizable Templates: Tailor task templates to suit your workflow. Add priority labels for each task.
➣ Privacy Assurance: Your data stays private and secure. We don't store any email content or task data.
